short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View RateMyProfessor scores directly on the Drexel course registration page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Color coding from red to green based on their score. Transparency reflects review certainty and is based on how many reviews a professor has.

This extension retrieves information about each Drexel professor from RateMyProfessor and displays it on the Drexel class registration page. It retrieves the information based on the professor's name. No information will be shown if the professor's name is different or absent from RateMyProfessor.

Clicking on a professor's name will open their RateMyProfessor page in a new tab.
